Questions or Disputes About Representatives
Refer any legal questions or disputes about the extent of a person’s authority to serve as a representative to the District Counsel.
Reference
:  For more information on referring questions and disputes to the District Counsel, see
38 CFR 14.629
, and
38 CFR 14.631(d)
.
